title: A Guide To Starting A Natural Therapy Practice | ANTA
cleaned_text: If you haven't decided which natural therapy to study, you'll need to thoroughly research the modalities, and make a decision about which to embark on. Take care to choose a modality that best suits your skills, personality, financial goals, and demand in your local area. If possible, talk to qualified natural therapists who are already working in their field, to find out more information about the day-to-day of the job. Many natural therapists study multiple modalities, to broaden their scope of practice and offer a greater number of services to customers. If this is the case, you will need to research each of the modalities to make an informed decision.
